name: NamedItem
description: Represents a defined name for a range of cells or value. Names can be primitive named objects (as seen in the type below), range object, reference to a range. This object can be used to obtain range object associated with names.

properties.name: type
properties.description: Indicates the type of the value returned by the name's formula.

properties.name: value
properties.description: Represents the value computed by the name's formula. For a named range, will return the range address.

properties.name: visible
properties.description: Specifies whether the object is visible or not.

properties.name: comment
properties.description: Represents the comment associated with this name.

properties.name: scope
properties.description: Indicates whether the name is scoped to the workbook or to a specific worksheet.

properties.name: worksheet
properties.description: Returns the worksheet on which the named item is scoped to. Throws an error if the items is scoped to the workbook instead.

properties.name: worksheetOrNullObject
properties.description: Returns the worksheet on which the named item is scoped to. Returns a null object if the item is scoped to the workbook instead.

methods.name: getRange
methods.description: Returns the range object that is associated with the name. Throws an error if the named item's type is not a range.

methods.name: getRangeOrNullObject
methods.description: Returns the range object that is associated with the name. Returns a null object if the named item's type is not a range.
